name: Commission Report
query:
SELECT 
CONCAT(
        MONTHNAME(payroll_date), 
        ' ', 
        YEAR(payroll_date)
    ) as "Month:Data:120",
    employee as "Employee ID:Data:120",
    employee_name as "Employee Name:Data:300",
    
    SUM(amount) AS "Amount:Currency:120"
FROM 
    `tabAdditional Salary`
WHERE 
    payroll_date BETWEEN %(Start_date)s AND %(End_date)s
    AND type= "Earning"
    AND CASE
        WHEN %(Status)s = 'Submitted' THEN docstatus = 1
        WHEN %(Status)s = 'Draft' THEN docstatus = 0
        ELSE docstatus = 0 -- Default value if status is neither "Submitted" nor "Draft"
    END
GROUP BY 
    employee, CONCAT(MONTHNAME(payroll_date), ' ', YEAR(payroll_date));
